title: A Career in accountancy
creator_credit: Richard Wallace, Garry Blackledge and Artransa Park Studios
brief_description: Looks at three young people working in the field of accountancy and notes their reasons for choosing accountancy as a career as well as the range of options open to them. Also considers the role played by the Australian Society of Accountants. Suitable for secondary school level.
creator_credit_for_label: Richard Wallace, Garry Blackledge and Artransa Park Studios
